attributes.additional_details: Gcse’s tend to favour the smartest kids and this is unfair on the rest of the kids who could be less intelligent because of reasons out of their control. They are the ones who do badly in gcse exams and they then have a bad future. This is highly unfair.
attributes.background: Gcse exams are very important in a persons life as it determines a lot of what the future holds for them. This creates a lot of pressure and stress for a child as you take the exams when you are just 15-16 years of age. No one should have to go through so much at a young delicate age like that.
